name: Bench Press
description: The bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, triceps, and shoulders. It involves lying on a bench and lifting a loaded barbell off a rack, lowering it to the chest, then pushing it back up to the starting position.

name: Pull-up
description: The pull-up is a compound exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders. It involves hanging from a bar and pulling the body up until the chin is above the bar, then lowering back down to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Curl
description: The dumbbell curl is an isolation exercise that targets the biceps. It involves holding a dumbbell in each hand and curling them up towards the shoulders, then lowering them back down to the starting position.

name: Deadlift
description: The deadlift is a compound exercise that targets the back, legs, and grip strength. It involves lifting a loaded barbell off the ground and standing up straight with the weight, then lowering it back down to the starting position.

name: Barbell Squat
description: The barbell squat is a compound exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and core. It involves placing a loaded barbell across the shoulders and squatting down to a parallel position, then standing back up.

name: Bench Press
description: The bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, triceps, and shoulders. It involves lying on a bench and lifting a loaded barbell off a rack, lowering it to the chest, then pushing it back up to the starting position.

name: Pull-up
description: The pull-up is a compound exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders. It involves hanging from a bar and pulling the body up until the chin is above the bar, then lowering back down to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Curl
description: The dumbbell curl is an isolation exercise that targets the biceps. It involves holding a dumbbell in each hand and curling them up towards the shoulders, then lowering them back down to the starting position.

name: Deadlift
description: The deadlift is a compound exercise that targets the back, legs, and grip strength. It involves lifting a loaded barbell off the ground and standing up straight with the weight, then lowering it back down to the starting position.

name: Push-up
description: The push-up is a bodyweight exercise that targets the chest, triceps, and shoulders. It involves lowering the body down towards the ground and pushing back up to the starting position.

name: Seated Row
description: The seated row is a machine exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders. It involves sitting on a rowing machine and pulling the handle towards the body, then releasing back to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Fly
description: The dumbbell fly is an isolation exercise that targets the chest. It involves lying on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand and lifting the weights out to the sides, then lowering them back down to the starting position.

name: Leg Press
description: The leg press is a machine exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes. It involves sitting on a machine and pushing a weighted plate away from the body with the legs, then releasing back to the starting position.

name: Chin-up
description: The chin-up is a bodyweight exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders. It involves hanging from a bar with an underhand grip and pulling the body up until the chin is above the bar, then lowering back down to the starting position.

name: Triceps Extension
description: The triceps extension is an isolation exercise that targets the triceps. It involves holding a dumbbell in both hands and extending the arms overhead, then lowering the weight back down behind the head and extending back up to the starting position.

name: Calf Raise
description: The calf raise is an isolation exercise that targets the calves. It involves standing on a raised surface and lifting the heels up, then lowering back down to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Press
description: The dumbbell press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. It involves lying on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand and pressing the weights up over the chest, then lowering them back down to the starting position.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: The lat pulldown is a machine exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders. It involves sitting on a pulldown machine and pulling the bar down towards the chest, then releasing back to the starting position.

name: Hammer Curl
description: The hammer curl is an isolation exercise that targets the biceps and forearms. It involves holding a dumbbell in each hand with a neutral grip and curling the weights up towards the shoulders, then lowering them back down to the starting position.

name: Leg Extension
description: The leg extension is a machine exercise that targets the quadriceps. It involves sitting on a machine and extending the legs out in front of the body against resistance, then releasing back to the starting position.

name: Incline Bench Press
description: The incline bench press is a compound exercise that targets the upper chest, shoulders, and triceps. It involves lying on an inclined bench with a loaded barbell and pressing the weight up and away from the chest, then lowering it back down to the starting position.
